text: Anyone else having issue accessing `{{ contact.property_name }}` in HubL? We've noticed issues with multiple accounts where this has stopped working

I am trying to use different header.html dependant on what template is being used. I was looking to use the {% if template_meta.label is equalto "home.html" %} HEADER CODE 1{% else %}HEADER CODE 2{% endif %} but I can't get it to recognise the template_meta.label hubl code. Does anyone know if this is still a method? thanks
